ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::Default::RootCategoryName
ConfigItem.Description: Default category name.
Root Kategorie Name.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::Default::RootCategoryComment
ConfigItem.Description: Default category name.
Root Kategorie Name.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::Item::Voting::Rates
ConfigItem.Description: Rates for voting. Key must be in percent.
Gewichtung für die Bewertung. Der Key muss in Prozent angegeben werden.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::Item::Voting::Show
ConfigItem.Description: Show voting in defined interfaces.
Interfaces in denen das Voting Feature angezeigt werden soll.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::Item::Voting::QuestionLangKey
ConfigItem.Description: Languagekey which is defined in the language file *_FAQ.pm.
LanguageKey für die Frage bei der Artikelbewertung. Wird in den Sprachfiles definiert.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::Explorer::Path::Show
ConfigItem.Description: Show FAQ path yes/no.
FAQ Pfad anzeigen ja/nein.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::Explorer::ItemList::VotingResultDecimalPlaces
ConfigItem.Description: Decimal places of the voting result.
Dezimalstellen des Ergebnisses bei der Artikelbewertung.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::Explorer::ItemList::VotingResultColors
ConfigItem.Description: CSS color for the voting result.
Farben für die Anzeige des Ergebnises.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::Explorer::Path::Separator
ConfigItem.Description: FAQ path separator.
Trennzeichen im FAQ Pfad.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::Category::Icon
ConfigItem.Description: Category icon.
Kategorie Icon in der FAQ.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::Item::Icon
ConfigItem.Description: Item icon.
Artikel Icon in der FAQ.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::Explorer::QuickSearch::Show
ConfigItem.Description: Interfaces where the quicksearch should be shown.
Interfaces in denen das QuickSearch Feature angezeigt wird.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::Explorer::QuickSearch::ShowSubCategoryItems
ConfigItem.Description: Show items of subcategories.
Artikel aus Subkategorien anzeigen ja/nein.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::Explorer::LastChange::Show
ConfigItem.Description: Show last change items in defined interfaces.
Interfaces in denen das LastChange Feature angezeigt werden soll.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::Explorer::LastChange::ShowSubCategoryItems
ConfigItem.Description: Show items of subcategories.
Artikel aus Subkategorien anzeigen ja/nein.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::Explorer::LastChange::Limit
ConfigItem.Description: Number of shown items in last changes.
Anzahl der zu anzeigenden Artikel in letzten Änderungen.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::Explorer::LastCreate::Show
ConfigItem.Description: Show last created items in defined interfaces.
Interfaces in denen das LastCreate Feature angezeigt werden soll.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::Explorer::LastCreate::ShowSubCategoryItems
ConfigItem.Description: Show items of subcategories.
Artikel aus Subkategorien anzeigen ja/nein.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::Explorer::LastCreate::Limit
ConfigItem.Description: Number of shown items in last created.
Anzahl der anzuzeigenden Artikel in zuletzt erstellte Artikel.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::Explorer::Top10::Show
ConfigItem.Description: Show top 10 items in defined interfaces.
Interfaces in denen das Top 10 Feature angezeigt werden soll.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::Explorer::Top10::Limit
ConfigItem.Description: Number of shown items in the top 10 feature.
Anzahl der anzuzeigenden Artikel im Top 10 Feature.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::FAQHook
ConfigItem.Description: Default hook for FAQ.
Standard Bezeichner für eine FAQ.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::Default::State
ConfigItem.Description: Default state for FAQ entry.
Standard Status eines FAQ-Eintrags.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::WYSIWYGEditor
ConfigItem.Description: Show WYSIWYG editor in agent interface.
Anzeige eines WYSIWYG Editors im Agenten-Interface.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::ApprovalRequired
ConfigItem.Description: New FAQ articles need approval before they get published.
Neue FAQ Artikel benötigen eine Freigabe vor der Veröffentlichung.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::ApprovalGroup
ConfigItem.Description: Group for the approval of FAQ articles.
Gruppe für die Freigabe von FAQ Artikeln.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::ApprovalQueue
ConfigItem.Description: Queue for the approval of FAQ articles.
Queue für die Freigabe von FAQ Artikeln.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::ApprovalTicketSubject
ConfigItem.Description: Ticket subject for approval of FAQ article.
Betreff des Tickets zur Freigabe eines FAQ Artikels.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::ApprovalTicketBody
ConfigItem.Description: Ticket body for approval of FAQ article.
Body des Tickets zur Freigabe eines FAQ Artikels.

Setting.TextArea:
Hi,
a new FAQ article needs your approval before it can be published.
FAQ# : <OTRS_FAQ_NUMBER> Title : <OTRS_FAQ_TITLE> Author : <OTRS_FAQ_AUTHOR> State : <OTRS_FAQ_STATE>
If you want to do this, click on this link:
<OTRS_CONFIG_HttpType>://<OTRS_CONFIG_FQDN>/<OTRS_CONFIG_ScriptAlias>index.pl?Action=AgentFAQ&Subaction=Update&CategoryID=<OTRS_FAQ_CATEGORYID>&ItemID=<OTRS_FAQ_ITEMID>
Your OTRS Notification Master

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::ApprovalTicketPriority
ConfigItem.Description: Default priority of tickets for the approval of FAQ articles.
Standard Priorität von Tickets für die Freigabe von FAQ Artikeln.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::ApprovalTicketDefaultState
ConfigItem.Description: Default state of tickets for the approval of FAQ articles.
Standard Status von Tickets für die Freigabe von FAQ Artikeln.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::Item::Field1
ConfigItem.Description: Definition of FAQ item free text field.
Definition der freien Textfelder.

ConfigItem.Description: Definition of FAQ item free text field.

ConfigItem.Description: Definition of FAQ item free text field.
Definition der freien Textfelder.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::Item::Field6
ConfigItem.Description: Definition of FAQ item free text field.
Definition der freien Textfelder.

ConfigItem.Name: LinkObject::PossibleLink###8301
ConfigItem.Description: This setting defines that a 'FAQ' object can be linked with other 'FAQ' objects using the 'Normal' link type.
Definiert, dass ein 'FAQ'-Objekte mit dem Linktyp 'Normal' mit anderen 'FAQ'-Objekten verlinkt werden kann.

ConfigItem.Name: LinkObject::PossibleLink###8302
ConfigItem.Description: This setting defines that a 'FAQ' object can be linked with other 'FAQ' objects using the 'ParentChild' link type.
Definiert, dass ein 'FAQ'-Objekte mit dem Linktyp 'ParentChild' mit anderen 'FAQ'-Objekten verlinkt werden kann.

ConfigItem.Name: LinkObject::PossibleLink###8303
ConfigItem.Description: This setting defines that a 'FAQ' object can be linked with other 'Ticket' objects using the 'Normal' link type.
Definiert, dass ein 'FAQ'-Objekte mit dem Linktyp 'Normal' mit anderen 'Ticket'-Objekten verlinkt werden kann.

ConfigItem.Name: LinkObject::PossibleLink###8304
ConfigItem.Description: This setting defines that a 'FAQ' object can be linked with other 'Ticket' objects using the 'ParentChild' link type.
Definiert, dass ein 'FAQ'-Objekte mit dem Linktyp 'ParentChild' mit anderen 'Ticket'-Objekten verlinkt werden kann.

ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::Module###AgentFAQExplorer
ConfigItem.Description: Frontend module registration for the FAQExplorer object in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: CustomerFrontend::Module###CustomerFAQ
ConfigItem.Description: Frontend module registration for the CustomerFAQ object in the customer interface.
Frontendmodul-Registration für das CustomerFAQ-Objekt im Customer-Interface.

ConfigItem.Name: PublicFrontend::CommonParam###Action
ConfigItem.Description: Default value for the Action parameter for the public frontend. The Action parameter is used in the scripts of the system.
Standardwert des Action-Parameters für den öffentlichen FAQ-Bereich. Der Action-Parameter wird von den Skripten des Systems benutzt.

ConfigItem.Name: PublicFrontend::Module###PublicFAQ
ConfigItem.Description: Frontend module registration for the PublicFAQ object in the public FAQ area.
Frontendmodul-Registration für das PublicFAQ-Objekt im öffentlichen FAQ-Bereich.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::Item::HTML
ConfigItem.Description: Show FAQ Article with HTML.
HTML Darstellung der FAQ Artikel einschalten.

ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::HeaderMetaModule###3-FAQSearch
ConfigItem.Description: Module to generate html OpenSearch profile for short faq search.
Modul zum Generieren des HTML "OpenSearch" Profils zur FAQ-Suche über das Browser-Suchfeld.

ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::Output::FilterElementPre###FAQ
ConfigItem.Description: Defines where the 'Insert FAQ' link will be displayed.
Definiert wo der Link 'FAQ einfügen' angezeigt werden soll.

ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::Output::OutputFilterTextAutoLink###FAQ
ConfigItem.Description: A filter for HTML output to add links behind a defined string. The element Image allows two input kinds. First the name of an image (e.g. faq.png). In this case the OTRS image path will be used. The second possibility is to insert the link to the image.

Ein Filter zur automatischen Generierung von FAQ-Links, wenn ein Hinweis auf einen FAQ-Artikel identifiziert wird. Das Element Image erlaubt zwei Eingabeformen: Erstens der Name eines Icons (z. B. faq.png). In diesem Fall wird auf das Graphikverzeichnis des OTRS zugegriffen. Als zweite Möglichkeit kann man aber auch den direkten Link zur Grafik angeben (z. B. http://otrs.org/faq.png).

ConfigItem.Description: Frontend module registration for the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::Search###FAQ
ConfigItem.Description: FAQ search backend router of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::Frontend::Overview###Small
ConfigItem.Description: Defines an overview module to show the small view of a FAQ list.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::Frontend::AgentFAQSearch###ShowColumns
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the shown columns in the FAQ search. This option has no effect on the position of the column.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::Frontend::AgentFAQSearch###SortBy::Default
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the default FAQ attribute for FAQ sorting in a FAQ search of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::Frontend::AgentFAQSearch###Order::Default
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the default FAQ order of a search result in the agent interface. Up: oldest on top. Down: latest on top.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::Frontend::AgentFAQSearch###SearchLimit
ConfigItem.Description: Maximum number of FAQ articles to be displayed in the result of a search in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::Frontend::AgentFAQExplorer###ShowColumns
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the shown columns in the FAQ Explorer. This option has no effect on the position of the column.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::Frontend::AgentFAQExplorer###SortBy::Default
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the default FAQ attribute for FAQ sorting in a FAQ Explorer of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::Frontend::AgentFAQExplorer###Order::Default
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the default FAQ order of a Explorer result in the agent interface. Up: oldest on top. Down: latest on top.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::Frontend::AgentFAQExplorer###ExplorerLimit
ConfigItem.Description: Maximum number of FAQ articles to be displayed in the result of a Explorer in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: PreferencesGroups###FAQOverviewSmallPageShown
ConfigItem.Description: Parameters for the pages (in which the FAQ items are shown) of the small FAQ overview.

Hash.Item: FAQ limit per page for FAQ Overview "Small"

ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::Module###AgentFAQZoom
ConfigItem.Description: Frontend module registration for the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::Frontend::MenuModule###000-Back
ConfigItem.Description: Shows a link in the menu to go back in the FAQ zoom view of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::Frontend::MenuModule###010-Edit
ConfigItem.Description: Shows a link in the menu to edit a FAQ in the its zoom view of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::Frontend::MenuModule###020-History
ConfigItem.Description: Shows a link in the menu to access the history of a FAQ in its zoom view of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::Frontend::MenuModule###030-Print
ConfigItem.Description: Shows a link in the menu to print a FAQ in the its zoom view of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::Frontend::MenuModule###040-Link
ConfigItem.Description: Shows a link in the menu that allows linking a FAQ with another object in the zoom view of such FAQ of the agent interface.

Hash.Item: Link another object to the FAQ item

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::Frontend::MenuModule###050-Delete
ConfigItem.Description: Shows a link in the menu that allows to delete a FAQ in its zoom view in the agent interface.
